description:
The Legend of Zelda: Oracles of Seasons is one of the rare Capcom entries to the series.
The seasons in the world of Holodrum have been a mess since Onox captured Din, the Oracle of Seasons.
Gather the Essences of Nature, confront Onox and rescue Din to give nature some rest in Holodrum.
game: The Legend of Zelda - Oracle of Seasons

12.2.description:
I swear I know bird is written bird, not brid

## 🗳️ New Options
- Bird hints
    - If not disabled, the know-it-all birds will tell how many progression items can be found in different regions
    - If not disabled, the owls will give the location of a random progression item from your world. These are transmitted to the server once read
- Gasha nut kill requirement can now be set between 0 and 250 (wearing a gasha ring still doubles the progress towards the chosen number)
    - The default number of required kills has been decreased to 20, you can set it back to vanilla in your yaml

## 🛠️ Bugfixes
- Fixed rupee packs being bad and progression if the rupee old men give enough rupees
- Now handle properly all characters for the name of other players/items
- Fixed Warp to Start working while gathering a gasha nut which leads to issues (now you need to be on the ground and not having an animation happen to be able to warp to start)

## 🧠 Logic
- Using the iframes to walk through spikes is now in medium logic
- Added going from the d6 sector to lost woods to the logic
- Added dimitri clipping to hell logic
- Fixed a logic issue where Golden Lynel could be in logic without owning a season other than winter, coming from the tarm gate
- Fixed logic not considering the snow piles in lost woods blocking access to the phonograph deku, if coming from d6, the combination happens to be all winters and base season is winter
- Using mysteries is now in medium logic against the beetles and hardhats. Also 2 satchel are now required to be consistent with all the other fighting requirements
- Hell logic now consider the bomb jump in d7 to access the magunesu chest
- Added a new route to use Dimitri in winter to get to d5 using default lake's autumn

## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements
- Removed the stairs added by the rando to prevent softlocks in summer eyeglass island and put back the one going to deep woods (accounted for only in hard+ logic)
- Added autotracking support for the dekus
- Added the essences and jewels item groups
- Reworked item classifications:
    - Small Keys, D0's master key, Bombs, currency and trade items cannot be found in priority locations
    - Barren dungeon's map and compasses are now fillers and free to go out of their dungeon if their keysanity is enabled (they could be shown as useful in the future if that is desired)
- Changed few texts
12.2.title: Oracle of Seasons 12.2

oos-10.0.description:
## 🗳️ New Options

- New tiers of logic: Hell Logic
    - Poe skip and Early Eye Statues are moved to that difficulty
    - Other tricks and glitches expected in that difficulty are early red ore, poe skip 2, H&S skip, d4 without flippers and rooster adventure (Skipping straight to Onox is not in logic though)


## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Forced Black beast to be excluded if the AI is randomized
- Fixed the music not resetting when warping away from the cascade caves in Sunken City
- Fixed the sprite of the splash in the pool drop in d4 staying there and the item not requiring diving
- Fixed dive small key in d4 having a grab animation


## 🧠 Logic

- Fixed a logic issue not accounting for winter blocking access from the jewel outside of D4
- Fixed logic issues in D5 and D7 where self-locked keys could be considered reachable and making some doors openable in logic even if they couldn't
- Any weapon is now enough to be allowed to spend rupees in logic
- Pushing enemies into holes with a shovel is now medium logic
- Beating the poe sisters with the rod has been moved to medium logic
- Fixed logic about the central woods of winter not requiring items in winter if the flippers were obtained


## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements

- Added quick switch: By pressing start and B or A on the same frame while in game, items on B and A can be swapped with the first and second item in the inventory respectively (I heavily recommend the use of macros to use it, by binding start and B/A to the same key)
- Added a gale seed warp in cucco mountain
- Music now starts enabled when starting the game, mainly to allow alternate starts
- Seed trees now have the graphic of the seed they hold
- Start inventory no longer requires connecting to be obtained, it is now applied at file creation, without any animation
- Added autotracking for golden beasts and wild seeds
oos-10.0.title: Oracle of Seasons 10.0

oos-10.1.description:
## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Fixed an ACE vulnerability

## 🧠 Logic

- Fixed some issues with Rooster adventure logic

## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements

- Added the version to the slotdata so that the tracker can inform version inconsistency
oos-10.1.title: Oracle of Seasons 10.1

oos-10.2.description:
## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Fixed boomerang 2 alone being considered alone to be a way out of the village
- Fixed ricky's and moosh's flute not being considered bush breakers for the village exit
- Fixed a logic issue that only affected the generator and breaks the apworld on RC
- Made the apworld pass unit tests again

## 🧠 Logic

- Added Dimitri as a in-logic way to kill the golden beasts
oos-10.2.title: Oracle of Seasons 10.2

oos-12.0.description:
## 🗳️ New Options
- Bird hints
    - If not disabled, the know-it-all birds will tell how many progression items can be found in different regions
    - If not disabled, the owls will give the location of a random progression item from your world. These are transmitted to the server once read
- Gasha nut kill requirement can now be set between 0 and 250 (wearing a gasha ring still doubles the progress towards the chosen number)
    - The default number of required kills has been decreased to 20, you can set it back to vanilla in your yaml

## 🛠️ Bugfixes
- Fixed rupee packs being bad and progression if the rupee old men give enough rupees
- Now handle properly all characters for the name of other players/items
- Fixed Warp to Start working while gathering a gasha nut which leads to issues (now you need to be on the ground and not having an animation happen to be able to warp to start)

## 🧠 Logic
- Using the iframes to walk through spikes is now in medium logic
- Added going from the d6 sector to lost woods to the logic
- Added dimitri clipping to hell logic
- Fixed a logic issue where Golden Lynel could be in logic without owning a season other than winter, coming from the tarm gate
- Fixed logic not considering the snow piles in lost woods blocking access to the phonograph deku, if coming from d6, the combination happens to be all winters and base season is winter
- Using mysteries is now in medium logic against the beetles and hardhats. Also 2 satchel are now required to be consistent with all the other fighting requirements
- Hell logic now consider the bomb jump in d7 to access the magunesu chest
- Added a new route to use Dimitri in winter to get to d5 using default lake's autumn

## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements
- Removed the stairs added by the rando to prevent softlocks in summer eyeglass island and put back the one going to deep woods (accounted for only in hard+ logic)
- Added autotracking support for the dekus
- Added the essences and jewels item groups
- Reworked item classifications:
    - Small Keys, D0's master key, Bombs, currency and trade items cannot be found in priority locations
    - Barren dungeon's map and compasses are now fillers and free to go out of their dungeon if their keysanity is enabled (they could be shown as useful in the future if that is desired)
- Changed few texts
oos-12.0.title: Oracle of Seasons 12.0

oos-12.3.description:
Another derivative of 12.0, this time map will no longer crash and fixed a start inventory issue where the master diver wouldn't spawn, notably

## 🗳️ New Options
- Bird hints
    - If not disabled, the know-it-all birds will tell how many progression items can be found in different regions
    - If not disabled, the owls will give the location of a random progression item from your world. These are transmitted to the server once read
- Gasha nut kill requirement can now be set between 0 and 250 (wearing a gasha ring still doubles the progress towards the chosen number)
    - The default number of required kills has been decreased to 20, you can set it back to vanilla in your yaml

- Fixed rupee packs being bad and progression if the rupee old men give enough rupees
- Now handle properly all characters for the name of other players/items
- Fixed Warp to Start working while gathering a gasha nut which leads to issues (now you need to be on the ground and not having an animation happen to be able to warp to start)
- Fixed Start Inventory causing some interactions to not work

## 🧠 Logic
- Using the iframes to walk through spikes is now in medium logic
- Added going from the d6 sector to lost woods to the logic
- Added dimitri clipping to hell logic
- Fixed a logic issue where Golden Lynel could be in logic without owning a season other than winter, coming from the tarm gate
- Fixed logic not considering the snow piles in lost woods blocking access to the phonograph deku, if coming from d6, the combination happens to be all winters and base season is winter
- Using mysteries is now in medium logic against the beetles and hardhats. Also 2 satchel are now required to be consistent with all the other fighting requirements
- Hell logic now consider the bomb jump in d7 to access the magunesu chest
- Added a new route to use Dimitri in winter to get to d5 using default lake's autumn

## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements

- Added autotracking support for the dekus
- Added the essences and jewels item groups
- Reworked item classifications:
    - Small Keys, D0's master key, Bombs, currency and trade items cannot be found in priority locations
    - Barren dungeon's map and compasses are now fillers and free to go out of their dungeon if their keysanity is enabled (they could be shown as useful in the future if that is desired)
- Changed few texts

## 🛠️ Bugfixes

oos-13.6.0.description:
## 🗳️ New Options
- Added an option to add items from Oracle of Ages, named cross items. This includes 2 switch hooks, the seed shooter and the cane of somaria
 - This requires a vanilla US Ages ROM (the same as for the OoA rando)

## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements
- Owls can no longer hint pre-placed items
- Owls now give the name instead of the slot number of the hinter location's player
- Bombchus are now always in the pool, with a bigger inventory screen
  - To make sure it doesn't clog the pool, if 5 dungeons or more are excluded, bombs are packed by 20 instead of 10
- There is no longer a menu to access secret game, as this feature is not supported

## 🧠 Logic
- Added logic to use the heart ring to shoot beams with the noble/master sword (medium+ for L-2, hard+ for L-1)

## 🛠️ Bugfixes
- Fixed receiving a shield while having a shield eaten not upgrading the shield
oos-13.6.0.title: Oracle of Seasons 13.6.0

oos-13.6.1.description:
## 🗳️ New Options
- Added an option to add items from Oracle of Ages, named cross items. This includes 2 switch hooks, the seed shooter and the cane of somaria
 - This requires a vanilla US Ages ROM (the same as for the OoA rando)

## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements
- Owls can no longer hint pre-placed items
- Owls now give the name instead of the slot number of the hinter location's player
- Bombchus are now always in the pool, with a bigger inventory screen
  - To make sure it doesn't clog the pool, if 5 dungeons or more are excluded, bombs are packed by 20 instead of 10
- There is no longer a menu to access secret game, as this feature is not supported

## 🧠 Logic
- Added logic to use the heart ring to shoot beams with the noble/master sword (medium+ for L-2, hard+ for L-1)

## 🛠️ Bugfixes
- Fixed receiving a shield while having a shield eaten not upgrading the shield
oos-13.6.1.title: Oracle of Seasons 13.6.1

oos-13.7.3.description:
## 🛠️ Bugfixes
- Fixed bombchus not behaving well without cross items enabled
oos-13.7.3.title: Oracle of Seasons 13.7.3

oos-13.7.4.description:
## 🛠️ Bugfixes
* Fixed cross items not working
oos-13.7.4.title: Oracle of Seasons 13.7.4

oos-17.0.0-2.description:
## 🗳️ New Options
- Linked Hero's Cave can be enabled with an entrance in the Samasa Desert
  - Other options will be developed in the future
- Show Dungeons With Map is now an option, in case you don't want to know in advance where are all the dungeons when you start with all the map and compasses

## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements
- You are no longer guaranteed access to subrosia on minimal accessibility
- d3 entrance can now lead to d0/d2 again, having water tiles in the entrance if the floodgate is still closed
- Cut the number of bombs/bombchus to get a max of 50
- Map now shows which dungeon is there even though the tile is unvisited (still restricted by the yaml option)
- The ship is now always in the desert
- Moved the magnet ball falling in d5 to not see it at the bottom of the screen
- Added a tutorial room to encourage people to read the FAQ to learn about Impa's refill and warp to start, disabled when you first beat a seed.

## 🧠 Logic
- Added shield/shovel as in logic to kill stalfoses in the d4 water ring room
- Added pushing the like likes and killing the tektites with the switch hook in the d4 pool room to logic
- Jumping 3 holes is now required to reach the d7 miniboss (only needed a switch hook previously)
- Added the need to have sword and pegasus seeds to do the d7 left wind with a slingshot instead of magic boomerang in hell logic, as no setup is known without
- Fixed d7 entrance being in logic in winter without a shovel
- Added mysteries as in logic to beat the d3 spike beetles by breaking the pots to get them

## 🛠️ Bugfixes
- Fixed a crash happening on restricted pools with expensive shops
- Fixed switch hook's treasure text
- Fixed switch hook making tektites and piranhas freeze after a switch
- Fixed flowers using the wrong sprint in mt cucco when switch hooked
- Fixed enemy scrubs being switch-hookables
- Fixed leaving through d4 entrance while it is locked putting you in the wrong place
- Fixed rusty pirate's bell and seed shooter sharing a variable
- Fixed the magical ice owl sending a hint in AP when the Frypolar one is interacted with
- Fixed map and compasses being filler on the wrong dungeon
oos-17.0.0-2.title: Oracle of Seasons 17.0.0

oos-17.0.1.description:
This is a minor logic update, adding only the first two points of the logic category

## 🗳️ New Options
- Linked Hero's Cave can be enabled with an entrance in the Samasa Desert
  - Other options will be developed in the future
- Show Dungeons With Map is now an option, in case you don't want to know in advance where are all the dungeons when you start with all the map and compasses

## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements
- You are no longer guaranteed access to subrosia on minimal accessibility
- d3 entrance can now lead to d0/d2 again, having water tiles in the entrance if the floodgate is still closed
- Cut the number of bombs/bombchus to get a max of 50
- Map now shows which dungeon is there even though the tile is unvisited (still restricted by the yaml option)
- The ship is now always in the desert
- Moved the magnet ball falling in d5 to not see it at the bottom of the screen
- Added a tutorial room to encourage people to read the FAQ to learn about Impa's refill and warp to start, disabled when you first beat a seed.

## 🧠 Logic
- Moved the feather jumping at the floodgate tunnel from casual to medium
- Moved swordless diver's secret from medium to hard, added swimmer's as a medium way to beat the secret
- Added shield/shovel as in logic to kill stalfoses in the d4 water ring room
- Added pushing the like likes and killing the tektites with the switch hook in the d4 pool room to logic
- Jumping 3 holes is now required to reach the d7 miniboss (only needed a switch hook previously)
- Added the need to have sword and pegasus seeds to do the d7 left wind with a slingshot instead of magic boomerang in hell logic, as no setup is known without
- Fixed d7 entrance being in logic in winter without a shovel
- Added mysteries as in logic to beat the d3 spike beetles by breaking the pots to get them

## 🛠️ Bugfixes
- Fixed a crash happening on restricted pools with expensive shops
- Fixed switch hook's treasure text
- Fixed switch hook making tektites and piranhas freeze after a switch
- Fixed flowers using the wrong sprint in mt cucco when switch hooked
- Fixed enemy scrubs being switch-hookables
- Fixed leaving through d4 entrance while it is locked putting you in the wrong place
- Fixed rusty pirate's bell and seed shooter sharing a variable
- Fixed the magical ice owl sending a hint in AP when the Frypolar one is interacted with
- Fixed map and compasses being filler on the wrong dungeon
oos-17.0.1.title: Oracle of Seasons 17.0.1

oos-17.0.2.description: Fixed d11 alt entrance chest not being reachable with alt entrance disabled (there's now stairs)
oos-17.0.2.title: Oracle of Seasons 17.0.2

oos-17.0.4.description:
Again, small release, bombchu now has logic to get wild drops and kill the hardhats (medium+)
Also, bombchus are now refilled by Impa if you have more than 20 bombs
oos-17.0.4.title: Oracle of Seasons 17.0.4

oos-17.0.5.description: Fixed the final puzzle of d11 with randomized dungeons
oos-17.0.5.title: Oracle of Seasons 17.0.5

oos-6.1.description:
## 🔨 Bugfix Release

- Fixed Master Keys being expected to act as Boss Keys even in "All Small Keys" mode, leading to unbeatable seeds
- Removed leftover Rusty Bell Reforge logic event always granting Pirate's Bell logically, which was causing issues in minimal logic and could cause unbeatable seeds
- Fixed Warp to Start option description to reflect the new key combination used to trigger it

You can still use 6.0 patcher with this release, nothing changed on patcher's side.
oos-6.1.title: Oracle of Seasons 6.1

oos-6.2.description:
## 🔨 Bugfix Release

- Fixed Hero's Cave chest warp leading to a softlock if entrance was D8
- If "Maple Trade" contains a jewel, Treasure Map now indicates Horon Village fountain instead of Vasu's shop
- Added an option to slot data for tracker QoL
oos-6.2.title: Oracle of Seasons 6.2

oos-6.3.description:
## 🔨 Bugfix Release

- Fixed enabling Portal Shuffle without Dungeon Shuffle producing a .patcherdata file that could not be built into a ROM
- Made D3 entrance ineligible to be paired with D0 or D2 if their respective alt entrances are enabled (to avoid drowning loop of doom leaving through the front door)

(As suggested with the filename, patcher was unchanged from 6.2, so no need to re-download it if you already had it)
oos-6.3.title: Oracle of Seasons 6.3

oos-7.0.description:
## 🥇 Main Features

- **The patcher is now integrated inside the APWorld!**
    - This means you no longer have to download an external patcher, the APWorld does everything
    - The person who generates gives you an `.apoos` patch, just grab the same APWorld as the server and you can use that patch file to create your ROM through the Archipelago Launcher
    - Everything was rewritten basically, allowing for lots of improvements in all aspects

- **Quick season switching**
    - When using the rod to change a season, you now have a way to choose which season you want to summon instead of cycling through all seasons
    - Right after using the rod (or at the same time if you buffer out of a menu), hold the diagonal on the D-Pad which points to the icon of the season you want to summon (you can look at the top bar to see the icon layout when the rod is equipped)
    - If you hold no specific button, seasons cycle the same way they’ve always done

- **Options rework**
    - 🛑 **Please re-create your YAML option files from scratch, since many options changed names / values**
    - Many two-values options (”vanilla / randomized”) are now toggles (”true / false”) which are better presented on the options webpage
    - Many options were moved over to the cosmetic options system (see below for more details), and are now read from the `host.yaml` file of the person who patches the ROM

- **Improved filler item pool**
    - Filler item pool used to be filled to the brim with Rupees, which made it uninteresting at best and frustrating at worst
    - Random rings (following the ring quality option) can now appear as filler items, giving rings that weren’t placed previously. This means you get slightly more ring variety on each seed.
    - Smaller Ore Chunks (x10 and x25) can now appear in the item pool as filler items. It was tough to put packs of 50 Ore Chunks in big amounts, those two new items will help providing a more continuous flow of Ore Chunks throughout the seed.

---

## 🗳️ New Options

- **Shuffle Essences** (”Essence-sanity”)
    - If enabled, all essences are shuffled anywhere in the multiworld instead of being locked at the end of their respective dungeons
    - This also means post-boss pedestals can host any item, leading to potentially… *interesting* situations

- **Deterministic Gasha Nuts** (”Gasha-sanity”)
    - Sets the number of Gasha Nuts that will contain pre-generated items, from 0 to 16 (defaults to 0)
    - Each one of those nuts will have to be obtained from trees planted on **unique soil: s**etting a value of 16 will require you to plant a tree on every single soil in the game
    - As those are handled in logic, this means those nuts can contain progression items required by you or your friends to complete the seed
    - Logic expects you to:
        - be able to reach a new soil each time
        - have enough seeds to plant
        - be able to kill enemies in order to make the seed grow
        - be able to harvest the nut (any sword or Fool’s Ore)
    - Once all deterministic Gasha Nuts have been opened, the vanilla random reward algorithm kicks in for any other Gasha Nut obtained. Soils that previously disappeared will stay dead forever, though.

- **Extended Portal Shuffle**
    - You can now choose among “Shuffle Outwards” and “Shuffle” to set if portals can lead to other portals from the same dimension
    - This means you can now have Holodrum portals leading to other Holodrum portals (and the same goes for Subrosia)
    - One portal is guaranteed to link both dimensions to avoid blocking a full dimension entirely
    - Picking “Shuffle Outwards” does the exact same thing as before, forcing portals to connect to a portal from the opposite dimension

- **Start With Maps & Compasses**
    - Enabling this makes you start with Maps & Compasses for every dungeon, which is especially useful for newcomers
    - It also removes those items from the pool, adding variety to items that can be found inside dungeons
    - Unlike `start_inventory_from_pool`, items are given silently and instantly at the beginning of the seed

- **Randomize Lost Woods Main Sequence**:
    - In a similar way to “Randomize Lost Woods Item Sequence”, this enables randomizing the sequence which leads to Tarm Ruins / D6
    - If enabled, you need to use a shield against the Deku Scrub in a rabbit hole right after the jewel gate to learn the secret sequence

---

## ✨ Cosmetic Options

Cosmetic options are a new type of options which are contained inside the `host.yaml` config file of the person who patches the ROM, instead of being in the YAML file you pass to the generator.

In a racing context, it means a given seed can lead to ROMs with different cosmetic options for each of the racers.

By design, these options are guaranteed not to impact generation (at all) nor gameplay (in a significant manner).

- **Character Sprite**
    - ⚠️ No longer in the options YAML
    - It is now possible to manage your own sprite library in your local Archipelago install folder (inside `data/sprites/oos_ooa`)
    - As instructed in the docs, a repo has been set-up to have a comprehensive list of downloadable sprites: https://github.com/Dinopony/oracles-sprites/
    - You can put `random` as a value to pick a random sprite from your library for each generated ROM
    
- **Character Palette**
    - ⚠️ No longer in the options YAML
    - You can put `random` as a value to pick a random color for each generated ROM

- **Heart Beep Interval**
    - ⚠️ No longer in the options YAML

- **Reveal Hidden Subrosia Digging Spots**
    - ⚠️ No longer in the options YAML (as a value to “Shuffle Golden Ore Chunks”)
    - This also enables putting this on while *not* randomizing the contents, which is something you might want if you’re new to the game

- **Remove Music**:
    - if enabled, this removes all music in the game while keeping sound effects intact
    - *This is about the 491th time you’re clearing the game, it was about time you could play with your own music.*
    - if you want to remove the SFX as well, you can just turn off the sound output from your emulator instead

---

## ⏫ Improvements

- Initial Maku Tree text has been shortened **significantly**
- Once they have been taken at least once, portals now tell where they lead when selected on the map menu
- Rod of Seasons are now colored matching their season to make them recognizable when they are freestanding items
- When keysanity is on for a given set of dungeon items (small keys, boss keys, maps & compasses), getting such an item tells for which dungeon that item is in the textbox.
- Compass chimes are not triggered anymore when entering a room containing a Dungeon Map
- Dungeon-specific compass chimes are now only used when keysanity is on
- Versions are now strictly checked between generation and patching to ensure compatibility
- When selecting “Enforce Potion in Horon Shop”, the corresponding shop location is now removed (which was especially annoying for tracker completion)
- D8 is now introduced as “Sword & Shield Dungeon” instead of “Sword & Shield Maze” when entering it (since every other mention of it was using “Dungeon” naming)
- When Keysanity is enabled for Small Keys, keydrops no longer have skipped textboxes (to be able to see which dungeon that key is for)
- Shopkeeper now tell the real item name for remote items and who it belongs to (still truncated if it’s too long though). Hints are still given when entering shops to know the full item name
- When “Master Keys” option is set to “All Dungeon Keys”, they now have the sprite of the Boss Key instead of the Small Key to reflect their behavior better
- Improved secondary items subscreen layout (fixing Bomb Flower display at the same time)
- The Subrosia Seaside digging spot containing the item is now fixed, being decided at generation time. This was made to ensure better fairness and randomness
- Lost Woods sequences can now require transitions to the right, which wasn’t the case before for technical reasons
- Lost Woods sequences hints now use arrows to describe directions, which is cleaner and more visually understandable
- Moblin King doesn’t talk to you anymore when he notices you to the right of his fort near Sunken City

---

## 🧠 Logic

- Fixed D1 Goriya chest potentially being logically accessible without Ember Seeds, whereas it’s impossible in-game (thanks **Ishigh**)
- Fixed Fixed D2 backwards logic not expecting the player to kill enemies when going from the arrow room to the main entrance, whereas it’s needed (thanks **Ishigh**)
- Added bracelet to the list of tools enabling Ore Chunks farming in medium+ logic
- Jumping over a 6-wide liquid (with cape + pegasus seeds) is now in medium logic instead of casual
- Fixed logic expecting the player to go from D6 entrance to Old Man near D6 when spring was not the default season (preventing the player from breaking the “flower pillar”)
- Fixed a rare logic issue where Sunken City shop would become out of logic because there was not enough rupees in the seed

---
## 🛠️ Bugfixes



- Fixed a bug preventing from excluding D8 locations using the appropriate location group
- Fixed a bug preventing from putting dungeon items in “start_inventory” or “start_inventory_from_pool”
- Fixed buying Zora Ring, Fist Ring, Whimsical Ring or Protection Ring from a shop not giving the right ring
- Fixed seed trees generation not being deterministic (thanks **Ishigh**)
- Shuffled dungeons now appear as “Unknown Dungeon” on the map menu when not visited yet, instead of having showing the region where the shuffled dungeon comes from
- Fixed switching between map modes by pressing START inside the Maku Tree room causing graphical glitches on the map menu
- Fixed the ability to save-scum using warp to start to get a refill before warping back to your previous position using a save & quit
- Fixed generation sometimes failing with default options because of Subrosian Market logic checking Ore Chunks whereas there were almost none in the world
- Fixed Maku Tree tile not being marked as “visited” on the map when first visit happened after getting a few Essences

---

## 🚧 Known Issues

- Treasure Map is gone: it was pretty much useless in the current state of the Archipelago implementation and needs some love before it comes back.
oos-7.0.title: Oracle of Seasons 7.0

oos-7.0d.description:
## 🔨 Bugfix Release

- Fixed a generation crash when enabling "Enforce Potion in Horon Shop"

## Previous fixes from 7.0

- Fixed various generation & patching crashes
- Fixed wrong text showing for dungeon items in shops
- Fixed wrong seed being place on Horon Seed Tree when default seed was Gale or Mystery
oos-7.0d.title: Oracle of Seasons 7.0d

oos-7.1.description:
## ⏫ Improvements

- Using "random" on a cosmetic property is now seeded using the generation seed, which means applying the same patch several times will always produce the same random result

## 🔨 Bugfixes

- Fixed a patching crash when enabling "Enforce Potion in Horon Shop"
- Fixed combat difficulty not working properly

## 🗳️ New Options

- Added a `remove_items_from_pool` option which takes an item dictionary as value (similar to `start_inventory_from_pool`)
  - This removes the specified amount of items from the item pool
  - It is a dangerous option which can lead to unbeatable seeds, so use it at your own risk and please refrain from using it on very long generations
  - You can pair it with `accessibility: minimal` to maximize the odds of succeeding

## Previous fixes from 7.0

- Fixed various generation & patching crashes
- Fixed wrong text showing for dungeon items in shops
- Fixed wrong seed being place on Horon Seed Tree when default seed was Gale or Mystery
oos-7.1.title: Oracle of Seasons 7.1

oos-7.2.description:
## ⏫ Improvements

- `random` value for cosmetic options are now based on multiworld seed & player ID, which means each players has a different seed and successive patchings still produce the same sprite  / color combination

- Woman in Mayor's house now tells you how many deterministic Gasha Nuts were set in options (useful if you set "random")

- Slightly improved shop pricing to make it more interesting to play with

- Added a suffix system for sprite filenames which enables restricting a specific subset of colors for a specific sprite
  - This is made for people who play with both random sprite & random color, but who want a subset of colors for
    each sprite (e.g. "if I play with a Tokay sprite, I want it orange or red")
  - To do so, just add an underscore and allowed color initials at the end of the sprite filename (e.g. `tokay_ro.bin`)
  - When the sprite is chosen, if character palette is set to "random", it will pick a color from the suffix (e.g. red / orange)
 

## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Fixed season singularity options causing patching issues

- Fixed "Enforce Potion in Horon Shop" causing disconnects once the Potion was scouted by entering the shop

- Fixed Hero's Cave final chest triggering a compass chime inside Hero's Cave entrance

- Fixed a buggy portal destination string 

- Fixed map cycling being bugged when inside Onox Castle or Room of Rites

- Fixed received items being dropped on ground in the following situations:
  - when falling in a pit at the exact frame where item was received
  - when drowning in a water at the exact frame where item was received
  - when grabbing something at the exact frame where item was received
oos-7.2.title: Oracle of Seasons 7.2

oos-7.2b.description:
## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Fixed receiving items from the server while riding a minecart when it should not be possible
- Fixed client rarely crashing on connect because of delayed slot_data fetching
- Fixed items not using the red item sprite when they were flagged as both progession & useful
- Fixed quantities not working properly when using `remove_items_from_pool`

## ⬆️ Improvements

- Dungeon items (compasses, maps, small keys...) can now be placed on essence pedestals when shuffling essences
- Improved logic around Eyeglass Lake to better take Dimitri capabilities into account when taking advantage of autumn default season
oos-7.2b.title: Oracle of Seasons 7.2b

oos-8.0.description:
Finally, a new update for Seasons!

## 🗳️ New Options

- **Placed Essences (0-8)**
    - This defines how many Essences are placed by generation
    - This value must be greater or equal than “Required Essences”. If it is lower (can happen when either one is set to `random`), a new value is picked randomly in the valid range.
    - Removed essences are replaced by filler items while keeping their distribution behavior (meaning they will be placed on dungeon end pedestals if essence-sanity is disabled)
    - If some dungeon end pedestals were specifically excluded, those essences are excluded in priority if “Shuffle Essences” is disabled
    
- **Exclude Dungeons Without Essences**
    - If enabled, you are only expected to clear dungeons where an essence can be found on the post-boss pedestal
    - This is useful when “Placed Essences” is lower than 8, where you would still need to enter dungeons where there is no essence just in case a progression item would be there
    - If “Shuffle Essences” is enabled, this option has no effect since most dungeons would have no essence anyway
    - All dungeons remain completable according to chosen accessibility rule
    - This is especially interesting when used in pair with `start_hints` in order to know from the start which dungeons must be done and which ones must be ignored

- **Shuffle Business Scrubs**
    - If enabled, all four business scrubs which are accessible in rando will sell a one-time item that is randomized and handled in logic:
        - in Spool Swamp, near floodgate keyhole
        - in regular Samasa Desert quicksands
        - near D2 alt. entrance spiral room
        - before D4 mini-boss
    - If disabled or once their item has been bought, they sell a refill (similar to Impa) for 30 Rupees
    - This makes them relevant in some specific cases but still optional if you don’t want them in your pool of locations
    - ⚠️ Be careful: the scrubs in D2 and D4 can contain dungeon items like small keys or boss keys for that dungeon, just like any other location in there!

- **The “Shop Prices Factor” option is replaced by a new “Shop Prices” option**
    - This option can have the following values:
        - **Vanilla** → same prices as in vanilla game (roughly, Subrosian Market prices are the ones for successive vanilla rings, since they only contain Ore Chunks)
        - **Free** → all shop checks can be obtained for free
        - **Randomized (Cheap)** → prices are randomized with an average cost of 50
        - **Randomized (Reasonable)** → prices are randomized with an average cost of 100
        - **Randomized (Expensive) →** prices are randomized with an average cost of 200
        - **Randomized (Outrageous) →** prices are randomized with an average cost of 300
    - This option applies to:
        - All overworld shops
        - The Subrosian Market
        - Business scrubs (if randomized)


## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Fixed generation not working on recent versions of Archipelago caused by a breaking change in Archipelago core
- Fixed portals from overworld to overworld sometimes not setting season properly
- Fixed Rosa date not stopping when taking a portal from Subrosia to Subrosia
- Fixed a generation issue when using  `non_local_items: Everything` and Master Keys at the same time
- Fixed receiving items near a screen border causing a “text warp” (you can no longer receive items when near the edge of a room)
- Fixed a rare generation issue where it would sometimes fail with a very specific random portal layout
- Fixed some items with long names causing crashes in some shop slots
- Fixed quick season switching not working with spring


## 🧠 Logic

- Fixed a logic issue where “D7 right of entrance chest” did not expect the player to kill enemies
- Fixed an issue where Lost Woods default season was checked against both sequences in a wrong manner
- Fixed a logic issue regarding Spool Swamp logic in spring (spotted by Mashy, fixed by Ishigh)
- Added Mystery Seeds as a valid option to summon and beat first Poe in D7 (medium logic and above)
- Fixed a logic issue regarding access to Ingo for trading Goron Vase (spotted by Sagaz)
- Fixed a logic issue regarding season change to access Golden Darknut (spotted thanks to OmegaZeron’s tracker)
- Fixed an issue regarding the size of a liquid pool leading to vanilla Magnetic Glove chest in D5 (hard logic only)
- Fixed an issue where Syrup shop would be unreachable in casual logic because of rupee costs (spotted by LinksMan)
- Fixed an logic issue where player was expected to summon Maple by killing enemies using Gale Seeds (spotted by OmegaZeron)
- Added Feather as a requirement to jump over spiked floor in D6 north of spinner path
- Fixed a logic issue where pits in “D4 Stalfos stairs room” were not requiring Pegasus Seeds in casual logic, even though they are 2 tiles wide
- Hard logic now expects infinite rupee manips when owning the Shovel


## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements

- The whole way rupees and shops are handled has been improved
    - There is now a random “shop order” that is detemined randomly when generating the seed
    - Logic expects you to buy useful items from shops using this shop order
    - First shops (logic-wise) are made cheaper when prices are randomized, while last shops in the shop order are made more expensive
- Default text speed is now 5 when creating a save file
- Maple can no longer randomly drop a Piece of Heart or a Gasha Seed, which could provide an unfair advantage in racing context
- Topology is now enabled for that world, which means you can output spoiler logs with detailed paths to items
oos-8.0.title: Oracle of Seasons 8.0

oos-9.0.description:
## 🗳️ New Options

- **Secret Locations**
    - If enabled, all ten linked game secrets are available as location:
        - In Horon Village, in the hidden stairs behind the clock shop
        - In the graveyard, in the hidden stairs behind a tombstone
        - In Subrosia, in the cave with grass in it
        - In Sunken City, in the house in front of the entrance
        - In Subrosia, in the forge
        - In Subrosia, in the pirate house after they left
        - In the Temple of Seasons, beyond the waterfall
        - In Natzu, when talking to the deku while having every seed type
        - In the Goron Mountain, after giving a hot soup to Biggoron
        - In Horon Village, after receiving the mayor's gift

- **Show Dungeons With Essence**
    - This option is only relevant with excluded essences and essences not shuffled
    - This option can have the following values:
        - **Disabled** → Nothing special
        - **With Compass** → Sparkles will appear on the entrance of the dungeon on the map if the Compass was obtained and the dungeon has an Essence 
        - **Always** → Sparkles will appear on the entrance of the dungeon on the map if the dungeon has an Essence
    - The dungeon located in Subrosia will shine on that map, not on the Temple Remains

- **Rosa Quick Unlock**
    - If enabled, Rosa will be unable to be dated and will instead unlock all the doors she could open in Subrosia instantly

- **The "Remove Useless Rings" option is now "Required Rings" and "Excluded Rings"**
    - **Excluded Rings** removes all selected rings from the pool of rings that can be included for the world
        - **Excluded Rings** is by default all the rings that are excluded by Remove Useless Rings
    - **Required Rings** forces the chosen rings to be in the pool of items for the world
        - The Required Rings are forced to not be in barren dungeons (unless the accessibility is set to minimal)
        - ⚠️ Having too many required rings while having few locations may cause failures
    - Both options can be used to have rings in the start inventory:
        - A ring can be excluded and be added to the start inventory
        - A ring can be required and be added to the start inventory from pool
        - The only difference between the two approaches is that the first approach will leave a random ring in the pool while the other leaves a random filler in the pool


## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Fixed generation not working if D2 or D4 was barren while deku scrubs were randomized
- Fixed the deku scrub at the floodgate making the gasha spot disappear if the check was bought before the nut was gathered
- Fixed portal shuffle failing to recognize having d8 unreachable while less than 8 essences were placed but as many were required made the game unbeatable
- Fixed portal shuffle considering upper temple remain ↔ subrosia volcano as the only connection to subrosia was a valid layout
- Prevent dungeon items from being added in the item pool if they are going to be assigned to a dungeon, as removing them from the pool isn't compliant with Archipelago guidelines


## 🧠 Logic

- Fixed dungeon-locked items (such as keys) being placed without any logic (often resulting with a failure)
- Fixed old men logic with negative value breaking Archipelago's generation algorithm by locking away some shop items by getting access to them
- It is now in logic to jump in the d0 chimney without d0 access
- Logic now expects to exit D2 from the alt entrance
- Added a path in logic to go from Facade to the entrance in D2
- Fixed logic related to exiting D5 (entering through d2 alt entrance)
- Added a path in logic going through Vire's portal to get to spinner north, making **Ancient Ruins (2F): Chest North of Main Spinner** available with a single key
- Logic is now affected by rings in medium logic
- In medium logic, if the lost wood paths aren't randomized, it is not required by logic to talk to "learn" the sequence
- It is now in medium logic to punch levers from minecarts
- It is now in logic to use ember and mystery seeds to trigger levers from minecarts
- Added a path in logic to allow to get the old man near Blaino to be accessed by using Moosh to jump above holes
- Updated the Temple remains logic to be accessible in more ways
- Reworked the logic to beat ganon:
    - Ganon now requires a noble sword to be beaten in casual logic
    - Ganon can be beaten with any seed in medium logic
    - Ganon can be beaten with a satchel instead of a slingshot in hard logic
- Spring is no longer required in logic to jump from sunken city to eastern suburbs
- Free shops no longer require rupee farming to be available
- Fixed 30 rupee packs not being counted in logic
- Fixed keylocked key logic that would sometimes break in keysanity


## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements

- Barren dungeons now are forced to hold their dungeon related items even with keysanity due to the number of checks in the overworld being too low
- Small rupee packs (such as Rupees (1)) relative to the others cannot be progression anymore
- Reworked Ore Chunk to be generated in a similar way to Rupees in the item pool
- Renamed Natzu: Chest after Moblin Keep to Natzu Region: Chest after Moblin Keep for naming consistency
- Planted and gathered Gasha seeds are now auto-tracked on the tracker (assuming it was updated)
- Warp to start is now mandatory
- Rings that have no effect on logic are now fillers by defaults and can be found in barren dungeons
- The minimum number of Gasha Seeds is now fixed to the number of Gasha locations instead of 14
oos-9.0.title: Oracle of Seasons 9.0

oos-9.2.description:
## 🗳️ New Options

- **Weight support for sprite and palette selection**
    - Sprites and Palettes can now be written with weights, similar to yamls
    - If you want a color weight to only apply to a specific sprite, you can write color|sprite: weight.
        - For example, `red|link: 1` would add red in the possible palettes with a weight of 1 only if link is the selected sprite

- **???**
    - Templates generated in April will have access to two new options.
    - The given options will continue to work the rest of the year but will not appear on yaml generated after April
    - One of these options is designed to enhance the gameplay by making sure no one is left behind and requires another player having that feature enabled to get the full experience


## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Toggled off secret locations by default
- Fixed the client getting disconnected when entering a room with a business scrub or after being just launched
- Fixed sparkles on shown on dungeons being associated with the wrong compass and essence


## 🧠 Logic

- Fixed D0 logic considering the alt entrance was logically available even when it was disabled


## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements

- Renamed Natzu: Deku Secret to Natzu Region: Deku Secret for naming consistency
- Added tracking for where Link is
- Changed every item and location ID to allow rearranging the data internally or adding items without shifting every ID in the future
oos-9.2.title: Oracle of Seasons 9.2

oos-9.3.description:
Fixed a bug causing Maku to not give its seed to the player under some conditions in 9.2, full changelog compared to 9.0 :

## 🗳️ New Options

- **Weight support for sprite and palette selection**
    - Sprites and Palettes can now be written with weights, similar to yamls
    - If you want a color weight to only apply to a specific sprite, you can write color|sprite: weight.
        - For example, `red|link: 1` would add red in the possible palettes with a weight of 1 only if link is the selected sprite

- **???**
    - Templates generated in April will have access to two new options.
    - The given options will continue to work the rest of the year but will not appear on yaml generated after April
    - One of these options is designed to enhance the gameplay by making sure no one is left behind and requires another player having that feature enabled to get the full experience


## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Toggled off secret locations by default
- Fixed the client getting disconnected when entering a room with a business scrub or after being just launched
- Fixed sparkles on shown on dungeons being associated with the wrong compass and essence


## 🧠 Logic

- Fixed D0 logic considering the alt entrance was logically available even when it was disabled


## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements

- Renamed Natzu: Deku Secret to Natzu Region: Deku Secret for naming consistency
- Added tracking for where Link is
- Changed every item and location ID to allow rearranging the data internally or adding items without shifting every ID in the future
oos-9.3.title: Oracle of Seasons 9.3

oos-9.4.description:
## 🛠️ Bugfixes

- Fixed few things about AI randomizer
- Fixed the barrier stealing engine grease when broken instead of disappearing for good
- Like-Likes no longer show the "ate your shield" textbox if your shield was already eaten
- The smith secret no longer considers you having a shield if it was eaten
- Fixed the tracker not tracking the harvest of the desert gasha nut


## 🧠 Logic

- Added bombs as a way to kill strong enemies in medium logic


## ⏫ Miscellaneous Improvements

- The barrier cutscene to Onox now only shows the essences Link actually got
- Refills have been rebalanced : 
    - Impa now only refills 20 bombs
    - Deku Scrubs now refill the whole seed and bomb bag
- Experimental feature : discouraged the randomizer to always put the same items early
    - If you find seeds actually more repetitive, please share your feedback
- Made old patches back compatible with new versions as long as the major version is the same
oos-9.4.title: Oracle of Seasons 9.4
